# Methods Used

A number of analytical methods are available for use such as decision trees, classification trees, regression, multiple-regression. Not all of these techniques makes sense for our purpouses as they are used to predict diffrent types of information.

We utilized `X` methods in our analysis, while setteling on regression trees for our final reccomendation.

The main goal of our analysis is to predict how risky a particular car is, and therefore Regression trees make the most sense.
